metadata.name: The Silent Submarine
metadata.description: A survival mystery set on a damaged 1920s submarine. Oxygen is low, and someone is sabotaging the repairs.
metadata.author: Antigravity

rooms.description: The air is heavy and damp. Torpedo tubes dominate the space.

exits.description: You squeeze through the bulkhead into the control room.

rooms.description: Blinking lights and analog dials surround you. The heartbeat of the sub.

exits.description: You move back into the torpedo room.
A hatch leads to the mess hall.

rooms.description: A small, cramped dining area with bolted-down furniture.

exits.description: You return to the control room.

characters.name: The Captain
characters.secretGoal: Expose the saboteur before the sub hits the floor.
characters.personaPrompt: You are a disciplined leader. You trust no one but require their help.

characters.name: The Engineer
characters.secretGoal: Repair the oxygen scrubbers while keeping your shady past hidden.
characters.personaPrompt: You are practical and stressed. You know the sub better than anyone.

items.name: Wrench
items.description: A solid, heavy tool. Could be a weapon in a pinch.

items.name: Emergency Mask
items.description: Provides a few minutes of breathable air.

custom_tools.name: check_oxygen
custom_tools.description: View the current oxygen level in your room.
